```typescript
i18n: {
  defaultLocale: 'en',
  locales: ['en', 'es'],
  localeConfigs: {
    en: {
      htmlLang: 'en-US',
      label: 'English',
    },
    es: {
      htmlLang: 'es-ES', 
      label: 'Español',
    },

},
```

Add to navbar items:
```typescript
{
  type: 'localeDropdown',
  position: 'right',
},
```

```
docs/i18n/es/
├── code.json                           # React component translations
├── docusaurus-theme-classic/
│   ├── navbar.json
│   └── footer.json
├── docusaurus-plugin-content-docs/
│   ├── current.json                    # Sidebar labels
│   └── current/                        # Translated markdown files
│       ├── intro.md
│       ├── architecture/
│       ├── modules/
│       └── runbooks/
└── docusaurus-plugin-content-blog/     # If blog is translated
```

```bash
cd docs

```

- Code blocks remain in English
- Use explicit heading IDs: `### Hello {#hello}`
